Slugblaster.Name: Name
Slugblaster.StyleBonus: Show {this} for +1 style on a run
Slugblaster.slamPlaceholder: Angry, Jealous, Depressed, Bruised, Stressed, Grappled, Tired, Distracted, etc.
Slugblaster.doomPlaceholder: Horrors you can’t unsee, Things that follow you into adulthood, etc.
Slugblaster.legacyPlaceholder: Lasting accomplishments, Relationships, Trophies, Memories, etc.

Dicepool.OpportunityPlusOneIfFriendly: +1 if friendly or better with five or more factions
Dicepool.OpportunityPlusOneIfAllied: +1 if allied with one or more factions
Dicepool.OpportunityPlusOneIfUpAndComers: +1 for being Up & Comers tier or higher
Dicepool.OpportunityPlusOneIfRisingStars: +1 for being Rising Stars tier or higher

Traits.SpecialTraitExplainer: If this would help you with an action, you can mark 1 trouble to upgrade a 1-3 result into a 4/5 result.

Crew.ChallengesPlusOneRivals: +1 if rivals or worse with five or more factions
Crew.ChallengesPlusOneEnemies: +1 if enemies with one or more factions
Crew.ChallengesPlusOneUpAndComers: +1 for being Up & Comers tier or higher
Crew.ChallengesPlusOneRisingStars: +1 for being Rising Stars tier or higher
Crew.LegendsDesc: You did it. You’re slugblasting icons and the scene will never forget you. Even your mom’s friend Deborah knows you’re famous for “hockey or rapping or something” and no one can say you didn’t do something with your lives not that you were trying to prove that, right?)
Crew.MajorPlayersDesc: You get name-dropped routinely and everyone has an opinion on you.
Crew.MajorPlayersRewards: Four factions move further from neutral. Gain a third brand.
Crew.Name: Name
Crew.NobodiesDesc: You’ve been casually slugblasting a little while. You know how to hoverboard, you know how to get into a couple worlds, but no one knows who you are.
Crew.RisingStarsDesc: You get name-dropped routinely and everyone has an opinion on you.
Crew.RisingStarsRewards: +1 to opportunities, +1 to challenges and +1 hype.
Crew.UpAndComersDesc: You have people’s attention, and now they’ll decide if they care.
Crew.UpAndComersRewards: +1 to opportunities, +1 to challenges and a Rebrand if needed
Crew.WellEstablishedDesc: The scene knows you now. You’ve earned your right to be here.
Crew.WellEstablishedRewards: +1 and -1 with two neutral factions and a free two-way portal.

Playbook.SpecialGear: Special Gear this Playbook character has
